description.value:
Requirements The nosferatu overlord's last action was a successful claw Strike

Effect The nosferatu drags the target of the Strike close and freezes its mind in terror. The target must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:] save with a moderate DC for the nosferatu's level.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Immobilized] by fear until the end of the nosferatu's next turn.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Restrained] and takes a -2 circumstance penalty to its Fortitude DC against the nosferatu's Drink Blood ability until the end of the nosferatu's next turn.

Critical Failure As failure, and the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 2}.
